item.title: Swift 4 HTTP Request GET and POST
item.description: Some Summury Using the portfolio URL URLRequest URLSession URLSession.datatask(URLSessionDataTask) which take URLRequest and CompletionHandler as input Building your HTTP request step by step really make one know what he is doing. Also DO NOT USE (before you are ready) content of while using GET. Using datatask will make GET and POST more similar. URLSession.datatask(URLSessionDataTask) which take URL only as input. Should build your session step by step.
